Class PowerUp

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.Figure
model.Prop
model.PowerUp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Powerupper
public abstract class PowerUp extends Prop implements Powerupper
Power Up class. Object typed as Poweruppable can release a randomic Power up.
